vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for (1) an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for MU-1 Mixed Use District uses; and (2) a resolution terminating existing deed restrictions [Z978-175 and Z978-174] on property zoned a CR Community Retail District with deed restrictions [Z978-175 and Z978-174], on the northwest corner of President George Bush Turnpike and Frankford Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions; and approval of the termination of deed restrictions
Z190-298(CT)
